利物浦擊敗哈得斯菲賽後，高普解釋為甚麼再度在後防及門將選擇同一班球員：「在對熱剌賽前我認為他們很好，我不會因一場賽事改變我的意見。如果在場上有錯誤，你有兩個選擇，一是下一場作出變動，但你亦可維持不變。路夫蘭在熱身時最後一腳受傷了，當時他與馬迪普互傳，但弄傷了大腿肌肉，醫護團隊告訴我他不能上陣。你可見卡拉雲上半場仍在適應中，始終列任後備的球員心理準備不足，要突然擔正會有一定問題，但他在下半場發揮很好。」

Speaking after the game, Daniel Sturridge recognised the hard work that David Wagner’s side put in during the 90 minutes, “They were very defensive in the first half and they made it very difficult for us.

“We knew it could have been one of those days.

“We showed our character and got the job done in the end. It was a long week for us but we trained hard. We knew what we had to do.”

The 28 year old was pleased to reach a huge milestone in his career after being frustrated in recent games.

Sturridge said, “We showed our class – it was a cool finish from me, the game against Newcastle was similar but I’m grateful to God I finished!

“I completely forgot (about the 100 record) – I am grateful to God, hopefully I can score another 100 before I finish my career.

“I have a lot of respect for the boss, he makes the decisions, he put faith in me today and hopefully I rewarded him with a goal.

Every player at Liverpool has quality – we push each other every single day, Trent, Joe – they have been brilliant.”
